>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/rewards/v1/blocks/{block_height}/claimed-rewards"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



GetClaimedRewardsByBlock returns the claimed rewards for the provided block height

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"block_height","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"rewards":{"type":"object","properties":{"amount":{"type":"string"},"blockNumber":{"type":"integer","format":"uint64"},"claimer":{"type":"string"},"distributionRoot":{"type":"string"},"earner":{"type":"string"},"recipient":{"type":"string"},"token":{"type":"string"}},"title":"ClaimedReward"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
